tool.name: Minfi Get Beta

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
MSet <- get(load('$mset'))
beta <- getBeta(MSet)
write.table(beta, file = '$matrix', quote = FALSE, sep = "\t")

param.name: mset
param.label: MethylSet
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help: This tools outputs an interval file of methylation indices (beta values), which are continuous values between 0 and 1 representing the ratio/fraction of the intensity of the methylated-probe signal to the total signal intensity for each probed CpG site.
